name: IOBluetoothObjectPushUIController
desc: An NSWindowController subclass that supports the creation of an IOBluetoothObjectPushUIController object.

items.name: init!(objectPushWith: IOBluetoothDevice!, withFiles: [Any]!, delegate: Any!)
items.desc: Creates and returns a new IOBluetoothObjectPush object

items.name: func beginSheetModal(for: NSWindow!, modalDelegate: Any!, didEnd: Selector!, contextInfo: UnsafeMutableRawPointer!) -> IOReturn
items.desc: Runs the transfer UI as a sheet on the target window.

items.name: func getDevice() -> IOBluetoothDevice!
items.desc: Gets the object representing the remote target device in the transfer.

items.name: func getTitle() -> String!
items.desc: Returns the title of the transfer panel.

items.name: func runModal()
items.desc: Runs the transfer UI panel in a modal session

items.name: func runPanel()
items.desc: Runs the transfer UI as a panel with no modal session

items.name: func setIconImage(NSImage!)
items.desc: Manually sets the icon used in the panel.

items.name: func setTitle(String!)
items.desc: Sets the title of the panel when not run as a sheet.
